project_plan.name: Directory Monitoring Script in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python script to monitor a specified directory for new file additions and log the file's name and creation time to a log file.

task.name: Set up the Python environment and necessary libraries
Implement the main directory monitoring functionality
Add logging functionality to log the name and creation time of new files
Write tests for the directory monitoring and logging features
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
